ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '7'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge,defaults
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '7'
docker_image:
- condaforge/linux-anvil-comp7
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.description: The **uldaq** package contains programming libraries and components for developing applications using C/C++ on Linux and macOS Operating Systems. An API (Application Prog    ramming Interface) for interacting with the library in Python is available as an additional installation. This package was created and is supported by MCC.
about.summary: Contains a library to access and control supported Measurement Computing DAQ devices

about.description: The **uldaq** package contains programming libraries and components for developing applications using C/C++ on Linux and macOS Operating Systems. An API (Application Prog    ramming Interface) for interacting with the library in Python is available as an additional installation. This package was created and is supported by MCC.
about.summary: Contains a library to access and control supported Measurement Computing DAQ devices

name: libuldaq

about.description: The **uldaq** package contains programming libraries and components for developing applications using C/C++ on Linux and macOS Operating Systems. An API (Application Prog    ramming Interface) for interacting with the library in Python is available as an additional installation. This package was created and is supported by MCC.
about.summary: Contains a library to access and control supported Measurement Computing DAQ devices

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "libuldaq" %}
{% set version = "1.2.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/mccdaq/uldaq/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c28dd995b5392b05b6a32eac18b54173c126e2c575c5a5e46e7e2081f685e1f7
  patches:
    - 0001-configure.ac-use-PKG_CHECK_MODULES.patch
    - 0002-makefile.am-remove-installation-of-udev-rules.patch

build:
  skip: True  # [win]
  number: 0

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - autoconf
    - automake
    - libtool
    - libusb
    - pkg-config
  host:
    - libusb

test:
  commands:
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libuldaq${SHLIB_EXT}

about:
  home: https://github.com/mccdaq/uldaq
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Contains a library to access and control supported Measurement Computing DAQ devices
  description: The **uldaq** package contains programming libraries and components for developing applications using C/C++ on Linux and macOS Operating Systems. An API (Application Prog    ramming Interface) for interacting with the library in Python is available as an additional installation. This package was created and is supported by MCC.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jdowner
